## eva.js package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Component][api/eva.js.component.md) | Component contain raw data apply to gameObject and how it interacts with the world |
|  [Game][api/eva.js.game.md) |  |
|  [GameObject][api/eva.js.gameobject.md) | GameObject is a general purpose object. It consists of a unique id and components. |
|  [Scene][api/eva.js.scene.md) | Scene is a gameObject container |
|  [System][api/eva.js.system.md) | Each System runs continuously and performs global actions on every Entity that possesses a Component of the same aspect as that System. |
|  [Transform][api/eva.js.transform.md) | Basic component for gameObject, See [TransformParams][api/eva.js.transformparams.md) |
